channel.title: 五星 on 计算机学习笔记
channel.description: Recent content in 五星 on 计算机学习笔记

item.title: VSCode
item.description: VSCode # Microsoft/vscode 安装 # brew cask install visual-studio-code 配置 # settings.json { "gitlens.advanced.messages": { "suppressShowKeyBindingsNotice": true }, "gitlens.historyExplorer.enabled": true, "java.errors.incompleteClasspath.severity": "ignore", "materialTheme.autoApplyIcons": true, "workbench.colorCustomizations": {}, "materialTheme.accentPrevious": "Breaking Bad", "materialTheme.fixIconsRunning": false, // Controls the font family. "editor.fontFamily": "Consolas, '微软雅黑', Dengxian, Menlo, Monaco, 'Courier New', monospace", // "editor.fontFamily": "Inconsolata, Consolas, '微软雅黑', Dengxian, Menlo, Monaco, 'Courier New', monospace", "editor.

item.title: Goland
item.description: Goland # 快捷键 # 跳转 # 指定行 cmd + L 指定文件 shift + cmd + O 返回光标上一个位置 cmd + opt + 方向键 查询 # 函数列表 cmd + f12 当前文件查询 cmd + F 当前文件替换 cmd + R 所有文件查询 shift + cmd + F 所有文件替换 shift + cmd + R

item.title: IntelliJ IDEA
item.description: IntelliJ IDEA # 插件 # Alibaba Java Coding Guidelines # 教程 # xiaoxiunique/tool-tips # idea 中相见恨晚的技巧 https://atips.cn/idea/
